description: A design system for a Web3/crypto project landing page with a futuristic, neon, and slightly playful 'degen' aesthetic. The style is characterized by dark backgrounds, vibrant purple and cyan accents, glowing effects, and tech-inspired geometric patterns.

style.overallLook: The interface uses a dark purple, space-themed background with subtle grid and geometric overlays. The primary elements have a distinct neon glow effect, creating high contrast and a video game-like feel. The layout is structured within a central, bordered container that resembles a futuristic heads-up display (HUD).

primaryFont.comment: Suggested font for a futuristic, blocky feel. The actual font should be identified or a similar one chosen.

secondaryFont.comment: A clean, sans-serif font for body text and instructions.

layout.grid: Two-column layout within the main container.
layout.mainContainer: A central, screen-like frame with angular corners and decorative tech lines. This contains all primary content.

header.style: Contained within the top border of the main HUD-like frame.

centralCharacter.placement: Center of the layout, slightly overlapping both columns but primarily anchored to the left. It's positioned behind the PresaleCard but in front of the main background.
centralCharacter.animation: A continuous loop showing a character tossing money, adding dynamic movement to the scene.
centralCharacter.style: Matches the cartoonish, edgy style of the logo and branding.

background.animation: May include slow-moving particles or shifting geometric patterns to create depth.

primary.style: Filled with a purple-to-cyan gradient, white uppercase text, and an outer glow on hover.

secondary.style: Transparent background with a solid cyan border and cyan text.
secondary.hoverEffect: Background fills with a semi-transparent cyan color.

presaleCard.style: Contained within a bordered frame that matches the main HUD. It has a semi-transparent purple background.
presaleCard.glowEffect: A subtle inner and outer glow to make it pop from the background.

countdownTimer.containerStyle: Flexbox layout with individual boxes for Days, Hours, Minutes, Seconds.

inputFields.style: Transparent background with a bottom border in cyan. White text color.
inputFields.placeholder: Light gray or secondary cyan text.
inputFields.focusEffect: The bottom border glows more intensely.
